definitions.text: a duty that you are assigned to perform (especially in the armed forces)
the instrument by which a claim or right or interest or property is transferred from one person to another
the act of distributing something to designated places or persons
examples: the first task is the assignment of an address to each datum

definitions.text: (law) a transfer of property by deed of conveyance
an undertaking that you have been assigned to do (as by an instructor)
the act of putting a person into a non-elective position
examples: the appointment had to be approved by the whole committee
